alert.note: Alert for New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 4:49AM EST until January 11 at 5:30PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Connecticut... Yantic River near Yantic affecting New London County. For the Yantic River...including Yantic...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Major flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yantic River near Yantic. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Flooding along Otrobando Avenue at the Fitness World, Pleasant Street bridge and along Town Street at the Norwichtown Mall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:16 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 11.7 feet. - Bankfull stage is 8.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:16 AM EST Wednesday was 11.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling to 4.4 feet early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.6 feet on 02/03/1973. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Yantic River Yantic 9.0 11.7 Wed 4 am EST 6.9 4.5 4.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 500 PM EST.
